articles.description: Hyper Scape introduces fresh mechanics to help make it stand out in a crowded space, but is it enough?
articles.content: Ubisoft has entered the battle royale arena with the official reveal and technical test for Hyper Scape, and I know what you're probably thinking: another battle royale? In recent years we've seen so… [+7616 chars]
